BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
 
 The RaySGD+Tune long running distributed test is failing due to this error:
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8068268/89367475-f78a7300-d68d-11ea-8aeb-7b27ecf2ab2d.png></denchmark-link>
 
 We need to modify either the test or the kill_node command to not kill any nodes if there is only one node left in the cluster.
 Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS):
 <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
 
 Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments):
 bash ci/long_running_distributed_tests/run.sh --workload=pytorch_pbt_failure
 If we cannot run your script, we cannot fix your issue.
 
  I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue.
  I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.

comments_1.comment_text: Closing stale issue since the latest release passes. Please re-open if it is still a problem.

comments_2.comment_text: This error happens again in the latest release
